name: Dizzy Crushes His Enemies
description:
A fangame made in 2000 ish using the games factory. Jump on the enemies to kill them. There was a problem with the collider which means you sometimes take damage when you land directly on top of them. It's better to try to hit them from the corner.

Zaks has kidnapped the Yolkfolk (again) and Dizzy, Prince of the Yolkfolk and King of Magicland both at the same time, has had enough. Usually a very cerebral individual, he's finally resorted to brute force and will crush anybody who gets in his way on his mission to free his subjects and friends... 

also available here: http://www.yolkfolk.com/games/dizzy-crushes-his-enemies
